TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ThemeProvider extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a class that encapsulates theme and style sheet information for controls in a designer environment.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Page developers and control authors do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class. ASP.NET developer tool and designer builders use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService> interface to apply themes and their respective control skins to controls at design time.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class encapsulates the information needed to apply a theme or style sheet theme and its control skins to the child controls of a control in a designer.

MemberSignature.Value: public ThemeProvider (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host, string name, string themeDefinition, string[] cssFiles, string themePath);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host, string name, string themeDefinition, string[] cssFiles, string themePath) cil managed

Docs.param: An that represents the current designer environment.
The name of the theme or style sheet theme that the represents. This parameter can be .
Theme information passed to the method. These are the raw, concatenated contents of the theme.
The names of the cascading style sheet (CSS) files that are included with the theme that the represents.
The absolute path of the file that contains the theme and control skin information for the named theme.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `themeDefinition` parameter passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29> constructor represents the concatenation of all control skins associated with the theme but is not exposed directly by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class, as this particular parameter is passed to a <xref:System.Web.UI.DesignTimeTemplateParser> to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> and is not otherwise used.

Docs.summary: Gets the hash of the theme definition passed to the constructor.
Docs.value: A hash code for the string passed as the theme definition to the class constructor.

Docs.summary: Gets a set of strings that represent the names of any cascading style sheet (CSS) files associated with the current theme, if the theme is a style sheet theme.
Docs.value: An of strings that identify the CSS files associated with the theme or style sheet theme. This property might return .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is used by designer hosts to add style sheet links to CSS files when rendering HTML to a design surface.

Docs.summary: Gets an object that represents the current designer environment.
Docs.value: An that represents the current designer environment.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder GetSkinBuilder(class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed

Docs.param: The control to apply a theme and control skin to.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a instance for the specified control, which is used to apply a theme and control skin in a designer environment.
Docs.returns: A instance, if one is defined for the specified control type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.GetSkinBuilder%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> base class to apply a theme and any control skin to a control when it is built at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IDictionary GetSkinControlBuildersForControlType(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: A for which to retrieve any associated objects.
Docs.summary: Gets an object that contains a set of objects for the specified .
Docs.returns: An that contains a list of one or more objects associated with the passed to the method. This list is populated with objects where the is a , and its associated is the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetSkinsForControl(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: A for which to retrieve any associated skin names.
Docs.summary: Gets an of skin identifiers that are associated with the specified .
Docs.returns: An of skin identifiers, if control skins are defined for the specified . If no control skins are associated with the type, an empty is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.GetSkinsForControl%2A> method is used by designers to populate lists of control skin names. Designers use the list to bind to user interface (UI) elements or to display design properties for a given control type.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the theme or style sheet theme that the instance represents.
Docs.value: The name of the theme or style sheet theme that the instance represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.ThemeName%2A> property is set by the `name` property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29> constructor.
